gameworld.game.client

Class ClientGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameworld.game.client.ClientGame

  • public class ClientGame
extends java.lang.Object
    Current reprentation of the model on the client. Deals with the network and sends and receives updates to/from the server.
    Author:
    Kelsey Jack 300275851

      • getContents

        public java.util.List<Objects> getContents()
                                    throws NotAContainerException
        Gets the contents of the inventory (if there is one) in front of where the player is standing. If there is none, it returns an empty list.
        Returns:
        An unmodifiable list of enums representing the objects in the inventory.
        Throws:
        NotAContainerException
